feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 11:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: WNW 57 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm except 20 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 10 over the Highlands. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 except minus 10 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
